title: Kylie Jenner's driver gets into minor scrape on the way to Demi Lovato's extravagant Halloween bash
text:
Kylie Jenner looked startled when her driver got into a minor scrape with a Honda on the way to Demi Lovato's Halloween party at Hyde in Hollywood on Saturday.

The television personality, 22, had headed to the star-studded bash with friends when the collision occurred, leaving the silver Range Rover's rear bumper badly scratched.

Kylie had decided to dress as Madonna from the singer's 2003 VMA Awards Me Against The Music performance, while her best pal Anastasia Karanikolaou went as Britney Spears.

Accident: Kylie Jenner looked startled when her driver got into a minor scrape with a Honda as she made her way to Demi Lovato's Halloween party at Hyde in Hollywood on Saturday

The bump caught the attention of several party-goers, who were heading into the bash.

Some looked on while the mum-of-one sat in the back of the car with her eyes closed. MailOnline has contacted Kylie's representatives for comment.

But the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star didn't let the scrape ruin her night and later took to Instagram to share a video of herself and Anastasia dancing to Madonna.

Oh dear: The television personality, 22, had headed to the star-studded bash with friends when the collision occurred, leaving the silver Range Rover's rear bumper badly scratched

Crash: The bump caught the attention of several party-goers, who were heading into the bash

Bad luck: Kylie sat in the back of the car with her eyes closed after the collision

Scrape: The expensive Range Rover was badly scratched

So Vogue: Kylie had decided to dress as Madonna from the singer's 2003 VMA Awards Me Against The Music performance, while her best pal Anastasia Karanikolaou went as Britney

Iconic: With her blonde wig coiffed into a bun and with a top hat in hand, Kylie recreated the pop queen's look perfectly (Madonna pictured with Britney and Christina Aguilera in 2003)

Party-time: But the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star didn't let the scrape ruin her night, as she later took to Instagram to share a slew of videos

Hey, Britney! Anastasia emulated Britney's look in white lacy gloves, a frilly minidress and thigh-high boots

With her blonde wig perfectly coiffed into a bun and with a top hat in hand, Kylie recreated the pop queen's look perfectly.

Showing off her incredible figure in a black skintight jumpsuit, the reality star danced seductively before mimicking Madonna and Britney's famous kiss with Anastasia.

Earlier in the day, the television star joined Sofia Richie, Will.I.Am, and J Balvin to party.

She wore a slimming black number as she took to her Instagram to share her eventful night while out with some of her famous friends.

Having fun: Kylie Jenner hit the town with pal Sofia Richie Saturday for a wild night out that included J Balvin's concert and a meet up with rapper Will.I.Am

Backstage! Sofia and Kylie took a swig of the good stuff as they prepped for the show while backstage

Backstage fun! The two best friends appeared to have fun pre-gaming backstage as Will.I.Am joined in on the fun later on

For the evening out, Kylie wore a long-sleeve black leather button-up dress that had a high slit on the side. She complemented the look with black tights and ankle boots.

Sofia, meanwhile, kept it casual in a light colored turtleneck sweater and a black pair of high waisted pants as the two girls hung backstage at J Balvin's show.

The two best friends appeared to have fun pre-gaming backstage as Will.I.Am joined in on the fun later on.

Looking good: The besties smiled and pouted for social media

Showering looks: Kylie worked the camera as she posed in a shower while backstage at J Balvin's concert

She also shared a short clip of the two walking hand-in-hand as they headed to the show.

After posting a few pics of her famous friend's set she quickly hurried backstage to try on a pair of sleek glasses that changed colour.

Kylie and the influencer have been friends since they were younger, as Sofia is the daughter of Lionel Richie and ran in the same circle as Kylie's mother, Kris Jenner.

Growing up, they were spotted at concerts together and even sat next to one another at New York Fashion Week back in 2017, shortly before she started to date Scott Disick (Kylie's sister Kourtney Kardashian's ex-girlfriend.)

Trying it out: Kylie tried on the eccentric glasses that Will.I.Am was wearing to see if they went with her look of the night

Good friends: Kylie and J Balvin pose backstage ahead of his big performance
description: Kylie Jenner looked startled when her driver got into a minor scrape with a Honda on the way to Demi Lovato's Halloween party at Hyde in Hollywood on Saturday.
